meanings.sent1: During the festival, everyone joined in the tarantella.
meanings.sent2: The traditional wedding included a tarantella dance.
meanings.sent3: The children's playful tarantella brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her energy on the dance floor was like a tarantella in motion.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the costumes matched the lively spirit of the tarantella.

meanings.definition: A piece of music composed in the style of this dance.
meanings.sent1: The orchestra played a beautiful tarantella at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The composer's latest piece was inspired by the tarantella.
meanings.sent3: The catchy tarantella melody stayed in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: The music box tinkled a sweet tarantella tune.
meanings.sent5: The tarantella music filled the room with joy and rhythm.
